Quick search

It includes following language algorithms:

  • Danish
  • Dutch
  • English (Standard, Porter)
  • Finnish
  • French
  • German
  • Hungarian
  • Italian
  • Norwegian
  • Portuguese
  • Romanian
  • Russian
  • Spanish
  • Swedish
  • Turkish

This is a pure Python stemming library. If PyStemmer is available, this module uses it to accelerate.
